mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDS_TB (B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, B_VIEWS, HD_CODE, HD_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NICK) VALUES (#{b_title}, #{b_content}, NOW(), #{b_views}, #{hd_code}, #{hd_name}, #{user_id}, #{user_nick});
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDS_TB SET B_TITLE = #{b_title}, B_CONTENT = #{b_content}, CREATED_AT = #{created_at}, B_VIEWS = #{b_views}, HD_CODE = #{hd_code}, HD_NAME = #{hd_name}, USER_ID = #{user_id}, USER_NICK = #{user_nick} WHERE B_SEQ = #{b_seq};
mapper.select: SELECT B_SEQ, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, B_VIEWS, HD_CODE, HD_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NICK FROM BOARDS_TB
SELECT B_SEQ, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, B_VIEWS, HD_CODE, HD_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NICK FROM BOARDS_TB WHERE HD_CODE = #{hd_code};

SELECT B_SEQ, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, B_VIEWS, HD_CODE, HD_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NICK FROM BOARDS_TB
WHERE B_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDS_TB SET B_VIEWS = B_VIEWS + 1, WHERE B_SEQ = #{b_seq};
